collection.title: Silicone Baby Bottles
collection.body_html: Soft, safe, and designed to mimic the natural feel of breastfeeding. Our collection of silicone baby bottles are made from 100% food-grade silicone, making them lightweight, unbreakable, and a perfect choice for tiny hands to hold. Their flexible nature makes them easy to clean and comfortable for your baby. Explore our range of aesthetic and ergonomic silicone bottles.

products.title: Aurelia Antibacterial Silicone Baby Bottle - Wide Mouth Nano Silver
products.body_html:
Aurelia Wide-Caliber Silicone Baby Bottle with Antibacterial Nano Silver Technology

Ensure safe and healthy feeding with the Aurelia Wide-Caliber Silicone Baby Bottle, designed with antibacterial nano silver technology for maximum hygiene. The wide-caliber design makes it easy to fill, clean, and use, while the soft, food-grade silicone ensures safety and comfort for your baby.

Perfect for weaning and everyday feeding, this innovative feeder helps protect against bacteria growth, making every mealtime safer. Its durable, lightweight, and heat-resistant build makes it ideal for both home and travel use.

Key Features:

  • Antibacterial Nano Silver: Inhibits bacterial growth for safe feeding.
  • Wide-Caliber Design: Easy to clean, fill, and handle.
  • Premium Silicone: BPA-free, non-toxic, and gentle on gums.
  • Durable & Heat-Resistant: Suitable for hot and cold liquids.
  • Perfect for Weaning: Helps transition toddlers to independent feeding.

Give your baby the safest feeding experience with the Aurelia Wide-Caliber Silicone Baby Bottle.

products.title: Babella Silicone Baby Bottle Brush - 360° Rotating Nipple Cleaner
products.body_html:
360° Rotating Silicone Baby Bottle Brush for Complete Cleaning

Keep your baby's feeding essentials spotless with the Babella 360° Rotating Silicone Baby Bottle Brush. Designed with soft yet durable silicone bristles, this brush provides a thorough clean without scratching bottles, nipples, or cups.

The 360° rotating handle makes cleaning effortless, ensuring every corner of bottles and nipples is reached with ease. Unlike traditional sponges, the silicone bristles are hygienic, quick-drying, and resistant to bacteria build-up, making it a safer choice for your baby.

Compact and easy to store, the Babella Bottle Brush is perfect for everyday cleaning and long-lasting use.

Key Features:

  • 360° Rotating Handle: Effortlessly cleans every angle of bottles and nipples.

  • Durable Silicone Bristles: Gentle, non-scratch, and long-lasting.

  • Safe & Hygienic: Quick-drying, BPA-free, and resistant to bacteria.

  • Versatile Use: Suitable for bottles, nipples, cups, and straws.

  • Ergonomic Design: Comfortable grip for easy cleaning.

Make feeding safer and cleaning easier with the Babella 360° Rotating Silicone Baby Bottle Brush.

Make cleaning baby bottles easier and more effective with the BabyWillow 360° Rotating Silicone Baby Bottle Brush. Designed for nipples, bottles, and cups, this multifunctional brush ensures thorough cleaning, removing milk residue and bacteria to keep feeding gear safe for infants.

The 360° rotating design allows for effortless scrubbing with minimal effort, while the soft, BPA-free silicone bristles are gentle on bottles and nipples, preventing scratches. Its ergonomic handle provides a comfortable grip, and the brush's multifunctionality makes it perfect for home or travel use. Keep your baby's feeding items hygienic with ease using BabyWillow.

products.title: Bottol Silicone Baby Bottle Brush Set – Special Washing Kit with Storage Box | Durable, Hygienic & Space-Saving Cleaning Essentials for Infant Feeding Bottles
products.body_html:
Bottol Silicone Baby Bottle Brush Set combines hygienic, durable design with a convenient storage box to create the perfect cleaning solution for modern families. This thoughtfully designed set ensures every bottle, nipple, and straw is thoroughly cleaned, keeping your baby’s feeding essentials safe and ready for daily use.

Smart Design Features

  • Soft silicone bristles provide thorough cleaning without scratching bottles
  • Durable construction ensures long-lasting use compared to traditional brushes
  • Ergonomic handle offers a secure, comfortable grip during washing
  • Multi-functional brush heads designed for bottles, nipples, and straws
  • Ventilated storage box keeps brushes organized and hygienic between uses
  • Quick-dry design prevents odor and bacteria build-up

Setup and Usage

  • Rinse brushes with warm water before first use
  • Use bottle brush for standard and wide-neck bottles
  • Switch to nipple or straw brush for smaller feeding accessories
  • After washing, rinse brushes and place back into the storage box
  • Clean brushes regularly to maintain hygiene

Product Specifications

  • Material: Premium food-grade silicone & durable ABS handle
  • Included Set: Bottle brush, nipple brush, straw brush, storage box
  • Style: Soft bristle, ergonomic design with ventilated storage
  • Colors: Classic White, Fresh Mint, Baby Pink
  • Suitable for: All types of baby bottles, nipples, and feeding accessories

Why Choose This Brush Set

 

  •  Gentle yet effective cleaning for baby bottles and accessories
  • Silicone bristles outlast traditional sponges or nylon brushes
  • Hygienic storage box prevents mess and keeps brushes fresh
  • Easy to clean and maintain for everyday use
  • Compact and space-saving, perfect for modern homes


A Nestacular Promise

At Nestacular, we believe in the quality of our products, so we offer a 30-day Money-Back Guarantee, no questions asked! When you purchase from us, there is ZERO Risk for you!

products.title: Liniq Wide-Caliber Silicone Baby Bottle – Safe Feeding Bottle for Infants
products.body_html:
The Liniq Wide-Caliber Silicone Baby Bottle is designed to provide infants with a natural and safe feeding experience. Made from premium, BPA-free silicone, this bottle is soft, durable, and gentle for babies, making it perfect for everyday feeding.

Its wide-caliber design allows for easier cleaning, faster milk preparation, and a smooth flow that reduces the risk of colic and gas. The realistic nipple shape mimics natural breastfeeding, helping babies transition between breast and bottle with ease.

Lightweight and safe, the Liniq Baby Bottle is an essential feeding companion for newborns and infants.

Key Features:

  • Wide-Caliber Design: Easy to clean & fill.

  • Safe Silicone Material: BPA-free & baby-safe.

  • Anti-Colic Nipple: Reduces gas & discomfort.

  • Natural Breast-Like Shape: Smooth transition between breast & bottle.

  • Durable & Lightweight: Perfect for daily feeding.

products.title: LittleLoom Baby Silicone Glass Feeding Bottle – Anti-Fall, Anti-Colic, Safe & Durable for Easy Feeding
products.body_html:
Give your little one a safer and more comfortable feeding experience with the Baby Silicone Glass Feeding Bottle. Designed with both anti-fall protection and an anti-colic vent system, this bottle helps reduce spit-ups, gas, and discomfort while ensuring durability and safety.

Made from premium borosilicate glass wrapped in soft, food-grade silicone, it is shatter-resistant, BPA-free, and heat-resistant, making it safe for daily use. The wide-neck opening allows for easy filling and cleaning, while the soft silicone grip ensures comfort for both parents and babies.

Perfect for formula or breast milk, this bottle combines durability, safety, and comfort—making it an essential for modern parents.

Key Features:

  • Durable glass bottle with soft silicone cover

  • Anti-fall & shatter-resistant for added safety

  • Anti-colic vent system reduces gas & spit-ups

  • BPA-free, heat-resistant & food-grade materials

  • Wide-neck design for easy cleaning & filling

A practical, safe, and long-lasting feeding solution for your growing baby.
